sourceDesc.p: Converted from a Word document written by mharty

list.item: convert those “,” things to just comma
for MH text files, insert corresponding MH citation

body.p: “Their grub is a foster child of the oak. I see equally if not more remarkable & regular ones on a black shrub- oak of this form attached to a leaf-green-a core like this being filled with air they burst with a puff when pressed. I see marks of a frost last night in sproutland hollow- young white oaks & hickories & some other oaks even have been touched & though not yet black, their leaves are crisped 7 come off.”
"XVII / 13 February-3 September 1854 / NNPM MA 1302:23 / PE 8, p.170 vol.8; Torrey JVI & JVII, p.#"
